title: Unturned将加入自然灾害？
author: 无名人
txt_content:
Rumors have been floating around the Liberator about fire breathing, earthquakes, lightning strikes... There's no basis to these... Right?
关于吹火、地震、雷击的谣言已经在解放者号周围传开来了。。。这些是没有根据的。。。对吧？
